text: Ara allah ekati drstanta upasthapita karachena tadera jan'ya yara imana eneche, -- phira'a'unera strira. Smarana karo! Se balechila -- ''amara prabhu! Amara jan'ya behesate tomara sannikate ekati abasa tairi karo, ara amake ud'dhara karo phira'a'una o tara kriyakalapa theke, ara amake ud'dhara karo an'yayacari lokadera theke.â€™â€™
